goal.ch: 訓練學生掌握相關文獻，且對環境相關議題能有深刻的哲學反省，並能針對問題而提出一套解決的理論構思。
goal.en: This course aims to provide students with a proper understanding of relevant materials. Besides, it is hoped that it can help the students to reflect on the relevant issues philosophically and try to suggest some theoretical solutions to the problems related.

outline.ch:
第一週：課程簡介
第二週：動物權(Singer)
第三週：動物權(Regan)
第四週：動物權(Frey)
第五週：人類中心主義
第六週：生命中心主義
第七週：生態中心主義
第八週：整體主義環境倫理
第九週：深層生態學
第十週：大地倫理學
第十一週：自然環境內在價值
第十二週：主觀內在價值(1)
第十三週：主觀內在價值(2)
第十四週：客觀內在價值(1)
第十五週：客觀內在價值(2)
第十六週：生態法西斯主義
第十七週：生態女性主義
第十八週：期末報告檢討
outline.en:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Animal Rights (Singer)
Week 3: Animal Rights (Regan)
Week 4: Animal Rights (Frey)
Week 5: Anthropocentrism
Week 6: Biocentrism
Week 7: Eco-centrism
Week 8: Holistic Environmental Ethics
Week 9: Deep Ecology
Week 10: Land Ethic
Week 11: Intrinsic Value in Natural Environment
Week 12: Subjective Intrinsic Value (1)
Week 13: Subjective Intrinsic Value (2)
Week 14: Objective Intrinsic Value (1)
Week 15: Objective Intrinsic Value (2)
Week 16: Eco-fascism
Week 17: Eco-Feminism
Week 18: Discussing the Term Paper

textbook.ch:
1.Michael E. Zimmerman, J Baird Callicott, George Sessions, Karen J. Warren, and John Clark, eds. Environmental Philosophy: From Animal Rights to Radical Ecology (New Jersey: Prentice-Hall, 2001).
2.Louis P. Pojman, ed. Environmental Ethics: Readings in Theory and Application, 4th ed. (London: Wadsworth, 2005).
3.其它自製教材。
textbook.en:
1.Michael E. Zimmerman, J Baird Callicott, George Sessions, Karen J. Warren, and John Clark, eds. Environmental Philosophy: From Animal Rights to Radical Ecology (New Jersey: Prentice-Hall, 2001).
2.Louis P. Pojman, ed. Environmental Ethics: Readings in Theory and Application, 4th ed. (London: Wadsworth, 2005).

flexDiscription.en: Participating students can review their learning progress and discuss any topics related to this course with the instructor.
